name: Amit Patil
title: Data Engineer
bio1: Informatica (IICS) Certified Data Engineer with 2 year of experience in Data Engineer field. Also 3x Microsoft Azure Certified.
bio2: Possesses a strong background in insights, ETL, data manipulation, data cleaning, transformation, and analysis.
bio3: Proficient in IICS for ETL oprations, Python for data manipulation, PySpark for big data processing, and Synapse Analytics for advanced analytics. Skilled in working with Azure services, Oracle & Postgresql databases. Proficient in designing and implementing efficient data integration solutions that enable organizations to harness the full potential of their data.
